title: Maximum Sum Subarray of Size K
whyPattern: We need maximum sum of contiguous elements of fixed size.
approach: Initialize window sum with first K elements
Slide window by removing left element and adding right element
Track maximum sum at each step

title: Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
whyPattern: Need to find longest substring with unique characters.
approach: Use hash set to track characters in current window
Expand window by moving right pointer
When duplicate found, shrink from left until duplicate removed
